title.en: It's just, I wish I could speak.

synopsis:
It's Tadano's first day of high school and all he wants to do is blend in the background. He starts to get to know Komi, a quiet girl in his class.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just a childhood friend. Plus more.

synopsis:
To help Komi make more friends, Tadano tries to enlist the help of a talkative classmate who's friends with everyone, but they promptly turn him down.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just stage fright. Plus more.

synopsis:
A nervous girl name Himiko Agari's anxiety levels go through the roof when Komi starts silently staring at her in a very intense way.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just a physical. Plus more

synopsis:
During the school health check up, competitive classmate Yadono is determined to clock better results than Komi, whom she sees as her ultimate rival.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just my summer uniform. Plus more.

synopsis:
Komi starts wondering why everyone starts staring at her when, like the rest of the student body, she switches from her winter to her summer school uniform.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just a joke. Plus more.

synopsis:
When Tadano gets to school, he finds Komi waiting for him in the classroom. She then nervously hands him a letter.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just the pool. Plus more.

synopsis:
Komi spends a lot of time getting ready for her trip to the local pool with Tadano and Najimi. Once they're there, they bump into even more friends.

(Source: Netflix)

It's the Obon holidays, and Komi is visiting her grandma's house. She can't help but feel a little awkward around her extended family.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just a country kid. Plus more.

synopsis:
It's the first day of the new semester and everyone is happy to see Komi again, but then a student named Inaka starts to follow her around.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just sports day. Plus more.

synopsis:
On the school sports day, Komi isn't sure how to properly cheer her classmates, but she does her best. Then, it's her turn to run the relay race.

(Source: Netflix)

title.en: It's just a performance for the culture festival. Plus more.

synopsis:
The students of class 1-1 have to decide what they're doing to do for the culture festival â€” a task they're all taking way too seriously.

(Source: Netflix)

At the culture festival, Najimi is up to something. They try to rope Komi and Tadano into their scheme.

(Source: Netflix)
